description: One-step sparring sequences for 3rd keup students

sequences.name: 1-Step Sparring #1
sequences.description: Basic attack with immediate defense and counter

steps.key_points: React quickly, maintain distance, strong counter
steps.common_mistakes: Slow reaction, backing away, weak counter

attack.description: Step forward with right foot into walking stance, execute obverse punch to middle section

defense.description: Block with left inner forearm while stepping back

counter.description: Immediately counter with right reverse punch
